snippet: Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan accused protesters of trying to stir up chaos ahead of local elections.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan condemns as 'fakers' protesters who have been demonstrating across country since death of 15-year-old Berkin Elvan; says demonstrators are trying to stir chaos before elections
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan accused protesters of trying to stir up chaos ahead of local elections.

headline.main: Turkish Leader Deplores Unrest, Calling Demonstrators ‘Fakers’
headline.print_headline: Turkish Leader Deplores Unrest, Calling Demonstrators ‘Fakers’
